title: I AM NELSON: The story of a little dog who is larger than life. Even when he's dead.
description: A beautiful book for dog lovers and anyone who’s ever loved and lost an animal.Get ready to laugh, cry and fall in love with a very feisty little rescue dog called Nelson. Discover the heartwarming true story about his life with his unconventional human family and friends who are right there by his side during the good times and the bad, and love him come what may – even when he misbehaves, which, admittedly is most of the time.This beautiful book, full of funny and touching memories that will make you smile through tears, is all about the very special bond between a dog and his beloved human family that not even death can break. But is death really the end of his journey?A funny and sad, silly and wise, bittersweet story of love and loss… and hope.
author: Martina Mars
